#summary Version History for ArkhamCalc

    * Increased toughness slider to max 6

  * *v1.1*, released 7/10/11
    * Added Shotgun calc
    * Added Number of Chances slider

  * *v1.0*, released 7/4/11
    * Initial release
    * Number of Dice, Toughness; Blessed, Cursed
